answer: The section "Version and Time-dependent Hierarchies" in the standard configuration documentation for the SAP Business Planning and Consolidation, version for SAP BW/4HANA application, directly addresses the creation, modification, management, and unique identification of time-dependent versions of hierarchies, using hierarchy time attributes and version management features.
ground_truth: SAP Business Planning and Consolidation（SAP BW/4HANA 版）应用程序文档 - 时间相关的层次结构
